perturbation.original_text:
Producer: Fulucai Productions Ltd.
Name of Contact: James Durward
Address: 3632-13 St. SW, Calgary, Alberta, Canada, T2T 3R1
Telephone: 403-689-3901
Email: jimdurward@shaw.ca
perturbation.changed_text:
Content Provider: Fulucai Productions Ltd.
Name of Contact: James Durward
Address: 3632-13 St. SW, Calgary, Alberta, Canada, T2T 3R1
Telephone: 403-689-3901
Email: jimdurward@shaw.ca
perturbation.explanation: The term 'Producer' is changed to 'Content Provider'. Throughout the document, the agreement refers to 'Producer' and their rights and responsibilities. Using the term 'Content Provider' introduces uncertainty about whether the same rights and responsibilities apply.

perturbation.original_text: Producer further grants to ConvergTV the right and license to Distribute and re-Distribute, including relicensing or sublicensing, the Program at such dates and times as are determined by ConvergTV in its sole discretion.
perturbation.changed_text: Content Provider further grants to ConvergTV the right and license to supply and re-supply, including relicensing or sublicensing, the Program at such dates and times as are determined by ConvergTV in its sole discretion.
perturbation.explanation: The term 'Distribute' is changed to 'supply'. Throughout the document, 'Distribute' defines the scope of rights provided to ConvergTV. Changing to 'supply' introduces ambiguity in the permitted actions and may limit ConvergTV's rights beyond simple supply.

perturbation.original_text: Producer shall take all reasonable steps to protect all copyrights pertaining to each Program from infringement and will institute such actions and proceedings as may be reasonable to prevent any unauthorized use, reproduction, exhibition or exploitation by third parties of the Program or any part thereof, or the material on which the Program is based which may be in contravention of the rights and license granted to ConvergTV herein.
perturbation.changed_text: Content Provider shall take all reasonable steps to protect all copyrights pertaining to each video from infringement and will institute such actions and proceedings as may be reasonable to prevent any unauthorized use, reproduction, exhibition or exploitation by third parties of the Program or any part thereof, or the material on which the video is based which may be in contravention of the rights and license granted to ConvergTV herein.
perturbation.explanation: The term 'Program' is changed to 'video'. By referencing both 'Program' and 'video', it creates confusion as to whether those terms are interchangeable. Is there a 'video' and a 'Program' separately, or are they the same thing?
